title: ANaiyA inba viLakkE
sahitya:
aNaiyA inba viLakkE enrum Atma jnAna perukkE gAndhiyE


anupallavi

  ninaiyE illAr nilaiyE kaNDAr engumE anboLi ninaittavar sheidAr


caraNam    sattiya jnAnamum shaktiyum niraindAr samarasa vAzhvai shAntamen ninrAr
ittarai enrumE EtriDa sirandAi iham tarum sutantira inbamum tandAi
